verses.text_plain: Preserve me, O God: for in thee do I put my trust.
verses.verse_html:
1Preserve me, O God: for in thee do I put my trust. ▼
▼ Michtam: or, A golden Psalm

tokens.text: for in thee do I put my trust

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Michtam: or, A golden Psalm

verses.text_plain: O my soul, thou hast said unto the Lord, Thou art my Lord: my goodness extendeth not to thee;
verses.verse_html: 2O my soul, thou hast said unto the Lord, Thou art my Lord: my goodness extendeth not to thee;

verses.text_plain: But to the saints that are in the earth, and to the excellent, in whom is all my delight.
verses.verse_html: 3But to the saints that are in the earth, and to the excellent, in whom is all my delight.

verses.text_plain: Their sorrows shall be multiplied that hasten after another god: their drink offerings of blood will I not offer, nor take up their names into my lips.
verses.verse_html:
4Their sorrows shall be multiplied that hasten after another god: their drink offerings of blood will I not offer, nor take up their names into my lips. ▼
▼ hasten…: or, give gifts to another

footnotes.body_text: ▼ hasten…: or, give gifts to another
footnotes.body_html: ▼ hasten…: or, give gifts to another

verses.text_plain: The Lord is the portion of mine inheritance and of my cup: thou maintainest my lot.
verses.verse_html:
5The Lord is the portion of mine inheritance and of my cup: thou maintainest my lot. ▼
▼ of mine…: Heb. of my part

footnotes.body_text: ▼ of mine…: Heb. of my part
footnotes.body_html: ▼ of mine…: Heb. of my part

verses.text_plain: The lines are fallen unto me in pleasant places; yea, I have a goodly heritage.
verses.verse_html: 6The lines are fallen unto me in pleasant places; yea, I have a goodly heritage.

verses.text_plain: I will bless the Lord, who hath given me counsel: my reins also instruct me in the night seasons.
verses.verse_html: 7I will bless the Lord, who hath given me counsel: my reins also instruct me in the night seasons.

verses.text_plain: I have set the Lord always before me: because he is at my right hand, I shall not be moved.
verses.verse_html: 8I have set the Lord always before me: because he is at my right hand, I shall not be moved.

verses.text_plain: Therefore my heart is glad, and my glory rejoiceth: my flesh also shall rest in hope.
verses.verse_html:
9Therefore my heart is glad, and my glory rejoiceth: my flesh also shall rest in hope. ▼
▼ rest…: Heb. dwell confidently

footnotes.body_html: ▼ rest…: Heb. dwell confidently

verses.text_plain: For thou wilt not leave my soul in hell; neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption.
verses.verse_html: 10For thou wilt not leave my soul in hell; neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption.

verses.text_plain: Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.
verses.verse_html: 11Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.
